Kansho - Appreciation - does not necessarily im=
ply all the ceremony. Some
blades are laid out for kantei and others just f=
or appreciation
(kansho-to). The etiquette for taking out and examining a s=
word is called
Kansho Saho (=8A=D3=8F=DC=8D=EC=96@)
=8E=E8=93=FC=82=C6=95=
=DB=91=B6
Teire -Care - and conservation (or preservation) 
=95=DB=91=B6=96=
@
Hozon-ho - Rules for conservation 

Is there a Kansho-shiki (ceremony)? I=
 think Kansho-saho is what you are
looking for...
